news_header: Thousands protested against President-elect Trump in Washington DC, while wildfires continue to devastate Los Angeles.
news_text: Thousands of demonstrators rallied in Washington DC against President-elect Donald Trump just two days before his inauguration. The annual People's March, previously known as the Women's March, highlighted various issues including reproductive rights and climate change. Meanwhile, in Los Angeles, wildfires have caused significant destruction, with firefighters battling multiple blazes and residents assessing the damage to their properties. A retired firefighter rescued a neighbor, and volunteers are assisting at donation centers as the community copes with the ongoing crisis.
